title: Holiday Event Checker
description: This function block checks for holiday events based on a given date. It uses an input date, a boolean enable signal, and searches a list of holiday data to determine if the date falls within any holiday event period. If a holiday is detected, it outputs a boolean indicating the event's status and the name of the holiday.
name: EVENTS

input.name: DATE_IN
input.description: The date to check for holiday events.

input.name: ENA
input.description: Enable signal to determine if the holiday event check should be processed.

output.name: Y
output.description: Output indicating if a holiday event is active.

output.name: NAME
output.description: The name of the holiday if an event is active, otherwise an empty string.

in/out.name: ELIST
in/out.description: An array of holiday data structures to check against the input date.
